name: Slither Link
description: SlitherLink is a kind of mathematical intelligence game, which consists of a checkerboard and a number in the checkerboard. When solving the problem, you must use the clues provided by the numbers to connect an uninterrupted closed loop on the checkerboard line.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: 1.6Ghz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7,Win8,Win10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
